sentence.Network_en: The afternoon's ride with him and Crossjay was an agreeable beguilement to her in prospect.

sentence.Network_en: Many who have believed his words have become victims of this beguilement.

sentence.Network_en: With the help of a legendary director, the actress perfected the art of cinematic beguilement.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一个传奇性导演的帮助下, 这位女演员完善了电影娱乐艺术.
